member.name: T:Anotar.NLog.LogTo
member.summary: Provides logging functions.

member.name: M:Anotar.NLog.LogTo.Trace
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Trace level.

member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Trace level.

member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message and exception at the Trace level.

member.name: M:Anotar.NLog.LogTo.TraceException(System.Func{System.String},System.Exception)
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message and exception at the Trace level.

member.name: P:Anotar.NLog.LogTo.IsTraceEnabled
member.summary: Returns true if trace is enabled.

member.name: P:Anotar.NLog.LogTo.IsDebugEnabled
member.summary: Returns true if debug is enabled.

member.name: P:Anotar.NLog.LogTo.IsInfoEnabled
member.summary: Returns true if info is enabled.

member.name: P:Anotar.NLog.LogTo.IsWarnEnabled
member.summary: Returns true if warn is enabled.

member.summary: Returns true if error is enabled.

member.name: P:Anotar.NLog.LogTo.IsFatalEnabled
member.summary: Returns true if fatal is enabled.

member.name: T:Anotar.NLog.LogToFatalOnExceptionAttribute
member.summary: If an occurs in the applied method then log it to Fatal.

member.name: T:Anotar.NLog.LogMinimalMessageAttribute
member.summary: Used to suppress message prefixing.

member.name: T:Anotar.NLog.LogToDebugOnExceptionAttribute
member.summary: If an occurs in the applied method then log it to Debug.

member.name: T:Anotar.NLog.LogToErrorOnExceptionAttribute
member.summary: If an occurs in the applied method then log it to Error.

member.name: T:Anotar.NLog.LogToInfoOnExceptionAttribute
member.summary: If an occurs in the applied method then log it to Info.

member.name: T:Anotar.NLog.LogToTraceOnExceptionAttribute
member.summary: If an occurs in the applied method then log it to Trace.

member.name: T:Anotar.NLog.LogToWarnOnExceptionAttribute
member.summary: If an occurs in the applied method then log it to Warn.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.StringFormatMethodAttribute
member.summary: Not for external use.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Annotations.StringFormatMethodAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Not for external use.
